tool_description:
Be certain that an individual claiming to work at a specific organization is not providing you a fake email ID that just “looks” like one from that organization by using the domain validation API.

 

For example, consider an employee claiming to be from a company “xyz”. The email employee@companyxyz.com and the email employee@companyxyz.org may refer to two completely different organizations – use the domain validation API to identify the right one.
name: Domain Validation
title: Domain Validation

api_list.name: Domain Validation
api_list.description:
Be certain that an individual claiming to work at a specific organization is not providing you a fake email ID that just “looks” like one from that organization by using the domain validation API.

 

For example, consider an employee claiming to be from a company “xyz”. The email employee@companyxyz.com and the email employee@companyxyz.org may refer to two completely different organizations – use the domain validation API to identify the right one.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-validation.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/domain"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-validation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://domain-validation.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/domain"
